title: Distributed architecture constraints
summary: A small set of rules that prevent accidental coupling as the platform grows.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Teams unintentionally recreate a central broker by overusing synchronous calls and shared models.
whenToUse: Multiple teams are building integrations in parallel
whenNotToUse: One team owns all integrations and releases together

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Enforce a few critical constraints (contracts, tracing, idempotency, versioning).

complexity.rationale: Constraints are simple; enforcement is the work.

realWorldExample.approach: Defined constraints and validated them in CI templates.
